title: Startup Jobs Scraper
description: Extract remote job listings from Startup.jobs - Get comprehensive job data from startups and tech companies worldwide.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Custom Startup.jobs URL to scrape. If set, overrides other search parameters.

keyword.title: Search Keywords
keyword.description: Job title or skills to search (e.g., 'software engineer', 'product manager').

location.title: Location Filter
location.description: Location filter. Default is 'Remote' for remote jobs.

collectDetails.title: Collect Full Job Details
collectDetails.description: Visit each job detail page to extract complete descriptions and additional information.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Jobs to Extract
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of job listings to collect.

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages
max_pages.description: Maximum number of result pages to process.

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Maximum concurrent browser pages (1-5). Lower values are more reliable.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings. Residential proxies recommended for best results.
